Docs.summary: The namespace provides a managed implementation of the Windows Sockets (Winsock) interface for developers who need to tightly control access to the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>, and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> classes encapsulate the details of creating TCP and UDP connections to the Internet.
